attributes.action: Remove Southern Rails Franchise and hand to TFL
attributes.background: Southern Rail are consistently failing customers and also failing to communicate properly, this is causing distress and major upset. Gate staff are given no information and are bombarded with questions they cannot answer. Things are getting worse not better. Please debate removing their franchise.

rejection.details:
It has already been announced that TfL will take over inner suburban rail services in and around London in 2021 - you can find out more here: 

http://content.tfl.gov.uk/dft-tfl-rail-prospectus.pdf

If you would like something different to happen - for example, for this change to be made more quickly - you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you want to happen.
